title: Exploring Photocatalytic Materials and Surface Defects: Mathematical Modeling for a Sustainable Future

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service teachers learn applicable mathematical approaches for real educational settings. Visualizes abstract photocatalysis concepts via VR/simulation and cultivates data-driven problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: The correlation between types of surface defects and photocatalytic reactions can be expressed as a mathematical graph
Using VR simulation tools, learners can collect/analyze photocatalytic reaction data and design optimization models
Real-world problems such as CO2 reduction and pollutant decomposition can be modeled with mathematical equations and solutions proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
